Package FinanceTrackerSystem.Controllers

Class UserProfileController

java.lang.Object
FinanceTrackerSystem.Controllers.UserProfileController
public class UserProfileController extends Object
Provides static methods to manage the profile of the currently logged-in user in the Finance Tracker System. This controller supports viewing, editing, and deleting user profiles, and ensures that changes are persisted to disk.

Responsibilities

  • Display the profile details of the current user.
  • Edit the profile details (name, address, phone number, date of birth) of the current user.
  • Delete the profile of the current user from the system.
  • Persist all changes to user data using UserController.saveUsersDetails().

Usage Example

 UserProfileController.viewProfile();
 UserProfileController.editProfile("Alice Smith", "456 Elm Ave", "555-5678", LocalDate.of(1990, 1, 1));
 UserProfileController.deleteProfile();

Dependencies

  • UserProfile - The profile model being managed.
  • UserController - For accessing currentUser and saving user details.

Thread Safety

This class is not thread-safe. All operations assume single-threaded access to currentUser. If used in a multi-threaded environment, external synchronization is required.

Validation

This class performs basic validation (e.g., existence of current user). Further validation (such as input format or duplicate users) should be handled externally.

Extensibility

Additional profile operations (such as password management, profile picture, or audit logging) can be added as needed.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserProfileController

      public UserProfileController()

  • Method Details

    • viewProfile

      public static void viewProfile()
      Displays the profile details of the currently logged-in user. Prints "User not found." if no user is logged in. The profile is displayed using its UserProfile.toString() representation.

    • editProfile

      public static void editProfile(String name, String address, String phoneNumber, LocalDate dob)
      Edits the profile details of the currently logged-in user. Updates the name, address, phone number, and date of birth fields. Persists changes to disk and prints a success or failure message.
      Parameters:
      name - New name of the user.
      address - New address of the user.
      phoneNumber - New phone number of the user.
      dob - New date of birth of the user.

    • deleteProfile

      public static void deleteProfile()
      Deletes the profile of the currently logged-in user from the system. Removes the user from the system-wide user list and persists changes to disk. Prints a success or failure message.
